title: No transfer option for EUW to OCE
body: Does anyone has an idea why there's no transfer option form EUW to OCE? Not in the store now{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is more than likely due to differing patch versions between regions, usually this is resolved within a few days.
I'd say take another look again on Friday, if it remains an issue I'll shoot a message off to the appropriate peeps to look into it.

Hope this helps,
Seph
There's still no option for that. Can u please help me with it? I've waited for almost a week. :/
Can you confirm or deny if you're able to transfer now, the option should be available now.

I transferred to NA to transfer to OCE, but now i can't purchase rp for my next transfer to OCE....oh god this is killing me!!! my purchase rp page gose all black and nothing else happens. Now im still not on OCE yet... help me to purchase rp, dont know why this happened

Hey there,

Transferring to NA to transfer to OCE was not the best idea, now you have to pay the transfer fee twice.

Are you still unable to load the store? If not, please try running through [this Support Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660-Issues-with-the-League-of-Legends-Store-PvP-Net-), let me know if it helps.
i was sinw from EUW this is my new summoner name in NA

Hey there,

The correct people have been notified and are currently looking into this, will update here when i find out more.
anyone?? pls help me i can't play in EUW anymore
